params.length: - the number of words (32 bytes) of data to read
params.offset: - the offset in the current contract's storage in words to start reading from

simulateAndRevert(address,bytes).details: Performs a delegatecall on a targetContract in the context of self. Internally reverts execution to avoid side effects (making it static). This method reverts with data equal to `abi.encode(bool(success), bytes(response))`. Specifically, the `returndata` after a call to this method will be: `success:bool || response.length:uint256 || response:bytes`.

params.calldataPayload: Calldata that should be sent to the target contract (encoded method name and arguments).
params.targetContract: Address of the contract containing the code to execute.

getStorageAt(uint256,uint256).notice: Reads `length` bytes of storage in the currents contract
